00001| # Claude Code Year in Review
00002| 
00003| A Python script that analyzes your Claude Code usage data and generates a beautiful HTML report with visualizations and a shareable Twitter card.
00004| 
00005| ## Features
00006| 
00007| - Analyzes Claude Code usage data from `~/.claude` directory
00008| - Supports multiple data sources: local, remote hosts (via SSH/rsync), and pre-fetched paths

00012|   - Full-year activity calendar (Jan-Dec) with month labels
00013|   - Usage streaks (current and longest)

00005| ## Project Overview
00006| 
00007| NautFlare is a standalone analytics dashboard that automatically discovers and visualizes Claude Code usage data from the `~/.claude` directory. It tracks costs, tokens, model usage, and performance metrics in real-time.

00010|

00012| - **Frontend**: React + Vite dashboard (port 4175) with baby blue theme

00014| - **Database**: PostgreSQL (port 5437) with analytics schema
00015|
